more.create_tasks_desc: Tap the + button to add new tasks to your weekly schedule
more.set_priorities_desc: Mark tasks as high, medium, or low priority using priority icons
more.track_progress_desc: Mark tasks as completed to track your productivity improvements
more.weekly_view_desc: Use the calendar to navigate between different weeks
more.settings_desc: Customize notifications, themes, and app preferences
more.pro_tip_desc: Complete tasks early in the week to maintain momentum and achieve your goals
more.high_progress_quotes: 🎉 Amazing progress! You’re on fire today!
🌟 You’re smashing it! Keep up the great momentum!
🏆 You’re a productivity champion! Awesome job!
more.medium_progress_quotes: 👍 Solid progress! You’re making steady gains!
📈 You’re on the right track! Keep pushing forward!
💡 Nice work! Every completed task brings you closer to your goals!
🎯 Great effort! Consistency is the key to success!
✨ Keep it up! You’re building momentum step by step!
more.low_progress_quotes: 🌱 Every journey starts with a single step. You’ve got this!
💪 Don’t give up! Small progress is still progress!
🌟 Tomorrow is a fresh chance to shine!
🎯 Focus on one task at a time. You’ll get there!
✨ Remember: Progress matters more than perfection!
more.no_progress_quotes: 🌅 New day, new opportunities! Make it count!
💫 Every expert was once a beginner. Start where you are!
🎪 Life’s a journey, not a destination. Enjoy the ride!
🌟 You have the power to shape your story!
🚀 The best time to start was yesterday. The next best time is now!
more.overdue_quotes: ⏰ Don’t stress about the past. Focus on what’s next!
🔄 It’s never too late to get back on track!
💪 Every stumble sets up a stronger comeback!
🎯 Let’s turn overdue tasks into completed wins!
more.streak_quotes: 🔥 You’re building an incredible streak! Don’t break it!
⚡ Consistency is your superpower! Keep it going!
🏆 You’re creating awesome habits! This is how success is built!
💎 Every day you commit, you grow stronger!
🌟 Your dedication is inspiring! Maintain that momentum!
more.progress_almost_done: 💪 Almost there, just one more step!
more.progress_empty: 📝 Haven’t started yet? Let’s get going!
more.streak_strong: 🔥 A full week of consistency! Great habit!
more.streak_consistency: ⚡ Consistency is the key to success! Stay on pace!
more.streak_start: 🌱 Every day you start builds a stronger habit!
more.overdue_tasks: ⏰ You have overdue tasks. Let’s clear them before they pile up!
more.quote_morning: 🌅 A morning full of energy and achievements!
more.quote_afternoon: ☀️ Make the most of the afternoon to tackle your key tasks!
more.quote_evening: 🌇 Evening hustle! You’ve still got time for a new win!
more.quote_night: 🌙 Relax and prep for a strong start tomorrow!
more.title: Weekly App
more.subtitle: Your Personal Task Manager
more.description_text: Weekly App is a powerful and intuitive task management app designed to help you stay organized and productive. With its simple interface and smart features, you can easily plan your week, track your progress, and achieve your goals. Whether you’re a student, professional, or anyone looking to boost productivity, Weekly App is your perfect companion.
